categories: Category:Classic Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back

nodes.text: Classic Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back 2
Classic Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back 2 collects the last three issues of Marvel Comics' adaptation of Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back.

The classic adaptation of the second Star Wars movie continues as Luke's Jedi training with Yoda progresses, and the Rebels' fight against the Empire takes a turn for the worse as Han Solo gets himself into a rather sticky situation. This second of two volumes reprints the Marvel Comics adaptation of The Empire Strikes Back from 1980.
